original_text: And she went, and sat her down over against him a good way off, as it were a bow shot: for she said, Let me not see the death of the child. And she sat over against him, and lift up her voice, and wept.
korean_text: 이르되 아이가 죽는 것을 차마 보지 못하겠다 하고 화살 한 바탕 거리 떨어져 마주 앉아 바라보며 소리 내어 우니

sentences.original_text: And she went, and sat her down
over against him a good way off
as it were a bow shot:
Let me not see the death of the child.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 아이의 죽음을 보지 않게 하옵소서.

sentences.original_text: And she sat over against him,
